mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member_career(affiliation_title, member_employment_type, member_role, member_skill, intro_detailed, start_date, end_date, member_id) VALUES (#{affiliationTitle}, #{memberEmploymentType},#{memberRole}, #{memberSkill}, #{introDetailed}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select c.id, c.affiliation_title, c.member_employment_type, c.member_role, c.member_skill, c.intro_detailed, c.start_date, c.end_date, c.member_id, c.created_datetime, c.updated_datetime, m.id from tbl_member_career c join tbl_member m on c.member_id = m.id where c.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_education(education_title, education_type, education_major, education_graduation, intro_detailed, start_date, end_date, member_id) values (#{educationTitle}, #{educationType}, #{educationMajor}, #{educationGraduation}, #{introDetailed}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{memberId} )
